meanings.definition: A basic structure underlying a system or concept.
meanings.sent1: The frameworks of a building provide support and shape.
meanings.sent2: The frameworks of a story help to outline the plot.
meanings.sent3: The frameworks of a puzzle make it easier to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the frameworks of her friendly personality.
meanings.sent5: The frameworks of a tree's branches create a beautiful silhouette.

meanings.sent1: The frameworks of a bridge ensure its stability.
meanings.sent2: The frameworks of a family are built on love and trust.
meanings.sent3: The frameworks of a joke are the setup and punchline.
meanings.sent4: His encouragement was the frameworks of her confidence.
meanings.sent5: The frameworks of a chair determine its strength and durability.

meanings.definition: A set of rules or guidelines for organizing something.
meanings.sent1: The frameworks of a project outline the tasks and deadlines.
meanings.sent2: The frameworks of a constitution establish the laws of a country.
meanings.sent3: The frameworks of a recipe ensure a delicious outcome.
meanings.sent4: Following the frameworks of a game makes it more enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: The frameworks of a schedule help to manage time effectively.
